Description: Level-up your live stream with Meld Studio with Elgato Stream Deck integration!
Name: Meld Studio

co.meldstudio.streamdeck.toggle-mute.Name: Track Mute
co.meldstudio.streamdeck.toggle-mute.Tooltip: Toggles the mute status of a track.

co.meldstudio.streamdeck.toggle-layer.Name: Layer Visibility
co.meldstudio.streamdeck.toggle-layer.Tooltip: Toggles the visibility of a layer.

co.meldstudio.streamdeck.toggle-stream.Name: Go Live
co.meldstudio.streamdeck.toggle-stream.Tooltip: Start or stop a live stream.
